attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Commence prosecutions of MPs and Ministers who have fraudulently claimed from the tax payer for non-work related expenses, second home flipping or who have not paid capital gains tax.

rejection.details: Government does not prosecute people. It is the role of the police to investigate suspecte crimes and pass any evidence to the Crown Prosecution Service, who decide whether or not to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
